meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bonnie Megel Neil Sondov Matt Hoffer-Hawlik Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7339.

td.p: Bonnie Megel, an administrative assistant from Grinnell, Iowa
Neil Sondov, a psychotherapist from Greenville, South Carolina
Matt Hoffer-Hawlik, an investment banker and strategy consultant from Boston, Massachusetts (whose 1-day cash winnings total $29,601)

tr.td: ALL HAIL THE CREATOR
FOOD & DRINK HOLIDAYS
19th CENTURY PEOPLE
GOOD & BAD INVESTMENTS
THE WRITE STUFF
POST HASTE
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with the letter "H" and it will come not too far after the word "haste" in the dictionary.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'This Mindy of "The Mindy Project" was named after Mindy in "Mork & Mindy"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: This Mindy of "The Mindy Project" was named after Mindy in "Mork & Mindy"
